Integrating Badgr into Canvas

  1. Make sure your Badgr account has the email address confirmed that you log into Canvas with.
  2. In Canvas: a) Go to Settings, b) select Apps, and c) click the Add App button.
    1. A (Open Thumnail)
    2. A (Open Thumnail)
    3. A (Open Thumnail)
  3. Select the Add URL method, and fill out the form using the Consumer Key, Shared Secret and Confif URL, shown below.
